```objective-c import Foundation import UIKit import RxSwift import RxCocoa

let minimalUsernameLength = 5 let minimalPasswordLength = 5

class SimpleValidationViewController : ViewController {

@IBOutlet weak var usernameOutlet: UITextField!
@IBOutlet weak var usernameValidOutlet: UILabel!
@IBOutlet weak var passwordOutlet: UITextField!
@IBOutlet weak var passwordValidOutlet: UILabel!
@IBOutlet weak var doSomethingOutlet: UIButton!

override func viewDidLoad() {
    super.viewDidLoad()

    usernameValidOutlet.text = "Username has to be at least \(minimalUsernameLength) characters"
    passwordValidOutlet.text = "Password has to be at least \(minimalPasswordLength) characters"

    // æ³¨ç›®ï¼ï¼
    let usernameValid = usernameOutlet.rx_text
        .map { $0.characters.count >= minimalUsernameLength }
        .shareReplay(1)

    let passwordValid = passwordOutlet.rx_text
        .map { $0.characters.count >= minimalPasswordLength }
        .shareReplay(1)

    let everythingValid = Observable.combineLatest(usernameValid, passwordValid) { $0 && $1 }
        .shareReplay(1)

    usernameValid
        .bindTo(passwordOutlet.rx_enabled)
        .addDisposableTo(disposeBag)

    usernameValid
        .bindTo(usernameValidOutlet.rx_hidden)
        .addDisposableTo(disposeBag)

    passwordValid
        .bindTo(passwordValidOutlet.rx_hidden)
        .addDisposableTo(disposeBag)

    everythingValid
        .bindTo(doSomethingOutlet.rx_enabled)
        .addDisposableTo(disposeBag)

    doSomethingOutlet.rx_tap
        .subscribeNext { [weak self] in self?.showAlert() }
        .addDisposableTo(disposeBag)
}

func showAlert() {

        title: "RxExample",
        message: "This is wonderful",
        delegate: nil,

}

} ```

```java String hoge = “hoge”;

ä¸Šè¨˜ã‚’è¦‹ã‚‹ã¨å¹¾ã¤ã‹å€¤ã®å–å¾—æ–¹æ³•ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‹ã‚‹ã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
ãã‚Œãã‚ŒSwiftã®è¡¨è¨˜ã«è¿‘ã—ã„ã¨ã“ã‚ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã¨æ„Ÿã˜ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

ä¾‹ãˆã°ã€getãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã¯å€¤ãŒnullã ã£ãŸå ´åˆã«NoSuchElementExceptionã‚’æŠ•ã’ã¾ã™ã€‚
é€†ã«è¨€ãˆã°ã€ç¢ºå®Ÿã«nullãŒæ¥ãªã„å ´åˆã®getãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ãŒåˆ©ç”¨ã§ãã‚‹ã¨è¨€ãˆã¾ã™ã€‚
ã“ã‚Œã¯Swiftã§è¨€ã†ã¨ã“ã‚ã®ã€Forced Unwrappingã€ã§ã™ã€‚

entry.title: Swiftã¨Java8ã¨JavaScriptã§reduce / filter / map / flatMap
entry.content:
Swiftã¨Java8ã¨JavaScriptã‚’æ¯”è¼ƒã—ã¦ã¿ã‚ˆã†ï¼

æœ¬æ—¥ã¯å‰ã€…ã‹ã‚‰æ°—ã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ãŸã€Swiftã¨Java8ã¨JavaScriptã€ã®æ¯”è¼ƒã‚’ã—ã¦ã¿ãŸã„ã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
ã¨è¨€ã£ã¦ã‚‚é›£ã—ã„ã“ã¨ã‚’ã‚„ã‚‹ã‚ã‘ã§ã¯ãªãã€ä»Šå›ã¯reduce, filter, map, flatMapãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã®æ›¸ãæ–¹ã‚’æ¯”è¼ƒã—ã¦ã¿ã¾ã™ã€‚

ç­†è€…å€‹äººã¨ã—ã¦ã¯ã€ã©ã†ã—ã¦ã‚‚Swiftã‚„Java8ã‹ã‚‰æ›¸ãæ–¹ã‚„ãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã®æ„å‘³ã®ç†è§£ã‚’å§‹ã‚ã‚ˆã†ã¨ã™ã‚‹ã¨æ™‚é–“ãŒã‹ã‹ã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
ãªã®ã§ã€JavaScriptã‹ã‚‰å…¥ã£ã¦æ¯”è¼ƒã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ç†è§£ãŒä¿ƒé€²ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã®ã§ã™ã€‚

ã§ã¯æ—©é€Ÿè¦‹ã¦ã„ãã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

reduceãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰

ã¾ãšã¯reduceãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã§ã™ã€‚

JavaScript

```javascript var array = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]; var reduced = array.reduce(function(previus, current) {

return previous + current;

}, 0);

// çµæœ –> 15 ```

Swift

```objective-c let array = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] let reduced = array.reduce(0) { (previous, current) –> Int in

previous + current

}

// çµæœ –> 15 ```

Java8

```java List integerList = Arrays.asList(1, 2, 3, 4, 5); Optional sum = list.stream().reduce((previous, current) –> previous + current);

// çµæœ –> 15 ```

filterãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰

æ¬¡ã«filterãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã§ã™ã€‚

JavaScript

```javascript var array = [1, 50, 800, 3, 44]; var filtered = array.filter(function(elem) {

return elem >= 10;

});

// çµæœ –> [50, 800, 44] ```

Swift

```objective-c let array = [1, 50, 800, 3, 44] var filtered = array.filter { (elem) –> Bool in

elem >= 10

}

// çµæœ –> [50, 800, 44] ```

Java8

```java List list = Arrays.asList(1, 50, 800, 3, 44); List filteredList = new ArrayList(); list.stream().filter(elem –> elem >= 10).forEach(elem –> filteredList.add(elem));

// çµæœ –> [50, 800, 44] ```

mapãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰

ç¶šã„ã¦mapãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã§ã™ã€‚

JavaScript

```javascript var array = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]; var mapped = array.map(function(elem) {

return elem * elem;

});

// çµæœ –> [1, 4, 9, 16, 25] ```

Swift

```objective-c let array = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] var mapped = array.map { (elem) –> Int in

elem * elem

}

// çµæœ –> [1, 4, 9, 16, 25] ```

Java8

```java List list = Arrays.asList(1, 2, 3, 4, 5); List mappedList = new ArrayList(); list.stream().map(elem –> elem * elem).forEach(elem –> mappedList.add(elem));

// çµæœ –> [1, 4, 9, 16, 25] ```

flatMapãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰

æœ€å¾Œã«flatMapãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã§ã™ã€‚
(ã¨è¨€ã„ã¤ã¤ã€å‡¦ç†ã®æ„å‘³çš„ã«ã¯flattenã—ã‹å…¥ã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ã­…)

JavaScript

JavaScriptã§ã¯æ¨™æº–ã§flatMapãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã¯å®Ÿè£…ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚
è‡ªä½œã™ã‚‹ã—ã‹ãªã„ã‚ã‘ã§ã™ãŒã€flatMap = flatten + mapãªã®ã§ä¸‹è¨˜ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«æ›¸ã‘ã¾ã™ã€‚

```javascript var listArrayList = [[1, 2], [3], [4, 5]] var flatMappedList = Array.prototype.concat.apply([], listArrayList).map(function(elem) {

return elem;

});

// çµæœ –> [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] ```

Swift

```objective-c var listArrayList:[Int]] = [] let list1: [Int] = [1, 2] let list2: [Int] = [3] let list3: [Int] = [4, 5] listArrayList.append(list1) listArrayList.append(list2) listArrayList.append(list3)

let flatMappedList = listArrayList.flatMap { (elem) –> [Int] in

return elem

}

// çµæœ –> [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] ```

Java8

```java List<List> listArrayList = new ArrayList<List>(); List list1 = Arrays.asList(1, 2); List list2 = Arrays.asList(3); List list3 = Arrays.asList(4, 5); listArrayList.add(list1); listArrayList.add(list2); listArrayList.add(list3); List flatMappedList = new ArrayList(); listArrayList.stream().flatMap(elem –> elem.stream()).forEach(elem –> flatMappedList.add(elem));

// çµæœ –> [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] ```
